prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and powerful cannons on its back.
I want a Pokemon that can swim extremely fast and has a blue color scheme.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a turtle but has a muscular build and large water jets.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its defensive abilities and water-based attacks.
Imagine a creature that thrives in aquatic environments and has a very strong shell.
Design a Pokemon that has a calm demeanor but can unleash powerful water blasts.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller form and is known for its strength.
